rules_text:
Whenever Claes, Shield of Karda attacks, another target attacking creature you control gains indestructible until end of turn.
Whenever a planeswalker you control enters, you may exile Claes, then return him to the battlefield transformed with a number of loyalty counters on him equal to the starting loyalty of that planeswalker.
special_text2:

[+1]: Scry 2. You may put a loyalty counter on another planeswalker you control.
[-1]: Create a 0/0 white Army creature token, then put a +1/+1 counter on each Army you control.
